text: long sumd ( long s , int n , int i , int j , int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) ; long sumr ( long s , int n , int i , int j , int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) ; int main ( ) { int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int i , j , tc , go , row , k ; long sumrt = 0 , sumdn , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & tc ) ; for ( go = 1 ; go <= tc ; go ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & row ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < row ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } sum = 0 ; sumrt = sumr ( sum , row , 0 , 0 , arr ) ; sumdn = sumd ( sum , row , 0 , 0 , arr ) ; if ( sumrt > sumdn ) printf ( "%ld\n" , sumrt ) ; else printf ( "%ld\n" , sumdn ) ; } return 0 ; } long sumd ( long s , int n , int i , int j , int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) { long sumdn , sumrt ; if ( i < n ) { s = s + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; sumdn = sumd ( s , n , i + 1 , j , arr ) ; sumrt = sumr ( s , n , i + 1 , j + 1 , arr ) ; if ( sumrt > sumdn ) return sumrt ; else return sumdn ; } return s ; } long sumr ( long s , int n , int i , int j , int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) { long sumdn , sumrt ; if ( i < n ) { s = s + arr [ i ] [ j ] ; sumdn = sumd ( s , n , i + 1 , j , arr ) ; sumrt = sumr ( s , n , i + 1 , j + 1 , arr ) ; if ( sumrt > sumdn ) return sumrt ; else return sumdn ; } return s ; }
